entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add peephole optimization to replace x86 SIMD instructions with smaller equivalents #112880
  • JIT: Wrong result with double comparison #112871
    10.0.0
  • Change the number of IOCPs used on Windows to 2 on larger machines #112870
    10.0.0
  • Disable spin-waiting in some cases when CPU quota is limited by default #112869
    10.0.0
  • [Tracking] New APIs for named synchronization objects #112868
    10.0.0
  • [outerloop] Assertion failed '(*use)->WasMorphed()' in R2R legs #112867
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HybridCache: span-based fetch #112866
  • [android] Add runtime logging support for CoreCLR on Android #112865
    10.0.0
  • SslStreamNetworkStreamTest failures "The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: PartialChain" #112856
  • `RotateLeft` and `RotateRight` of BigInteger is buggy. #112854
  • Mono AOT compiler crashes with: condition `p - buf < buf_size' not met #112850
  • Test failure: global::JitTest_castclass_ldloc_cs.TestClass.TestEntryPoint() #112848
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter #112847
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #112846
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests.Collections #112845
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #112844
  • Test failure: ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.ComInterfaceGeneratorOutputShape.EmptyComInterface #112843
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.ReadXmlSchema_Nested #112842
  • Test failure: Interop/DllImportAttribute/DllImportPath/DllImportPathTest/DllImportPathTest.cmd #112841
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestBaseline_TestWithNestedClass_Success #112840
  • [API Proposal]: `using` support for ArrayPool #112839
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestEmitter #112838
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.MultipleTypeDefinitions #112837

Closed

  • System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents sometimes throws #1785
  • ExpandoObject.ContainsKey and ExpandoObject.Keys.Contains return different results #39897
  • Could not load file or assembly ‘Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions, Version=6.35.0.0. Nuget version mismatch Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions #110865
  • SuperPMI: Investigate MISSING data for Linux/arm collection #80162
    Future
  • Disabling IPV6 in .NET Core #107979
    10.0.0
  • Missing serialization constructor in StringEqualityComparer? #112877
  • Binary formatter alternatives for resource serialisation #80155
    Future
  • System.Memory 4.6.0 release issue with NET48 #109827
  • [API Proposal]: Add a TryGetProperty Method in JsonNode to Check for Property Existence #112852
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.ConvertTests.ConvertChecked failing with System.OverflowException #112286
  • AV in `Loader/binding/assemblies/generics/arilistienum/methods/exceptions/exceptions.cmd` with OSR stress #112681
    10.0.0
  • On Windows machines, Regex does not consider `\n` a white-space character #112822
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CollectionTests "Assert.Equal() Failure: Values differ" #112738
  • Memory leak using SslStream in dotnet9 running on Linux #110803
    10.0.0
  • Why is `MemberExpression.Member` ownership not resolved the same way reflection does? #30942

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Disable PerfBDN tests. #112886
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Document NDK upgrade process #112885
    documentation, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Delete old parameter ABI classification #112884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use precise multireg arg check for old promotion #112883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112881
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • Fix the unsigned right shift operator of BigInteger #112879
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112878
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize `BigInteger.Multiply` by Toom-Cook multiplication #112876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix doc typo #112875
    documentation, area-System.DirectoryServices, 10.0.0
  • [Draft] callee type prop #112874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` #112864
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • arm64: Set zero flag for more comparisons #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    area-System.Net
  • Fix information flow about fingerprinting dotnet files in WBT #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use certificate thumbprints from entire chain in SSL_CTX cache #112858
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Zero-diff part of "Use SSA-based ComputeRange" #112853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra] Add runtime-extra-platforms to build analysis #112851
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Modify buffer overflow logic for System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.ReturnBufferWhenFullFiresDroppedDiagnosticEvent #112849
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Check for an empty string for the TimeZoneDirectory environment variable #112831
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Revert "Use rangecheck in assertprop (#112766)" #112872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix getting resource when `ResourceResolve` returns assembly with resource that is an assembly ref #112810
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Disable interpreter test on native AOT #112857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Narrow AddressFamily passed to getaddrinfo when IPv6 is unsupported #112642
    area-System.Net
  • Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112753
    area-System.Diagnostics, 10.0.0
  • Reformat `ZLibNative` comments #112585
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Remove thread pointer from AwareLock #112715
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove uses of old ABI information #112818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check ISA directly when printing `JitDisasm` #112828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use a unified cache for SSL_CTX objects #112567
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fixed typos in Native AOT optimizing document #112812
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Implement the "compact dispatch sections" optimization from CoreCLR's ComWrappers implementation in NativeAOT's implementation #112461
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Add callback to host-runtime contract for getting assembly data #112705
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [browser] samplepoint instrumentation into Mono profiler #112352
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Clean up code gen for floating comparisons #111626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Set AppContext.BaseDirectory and the lookup path for AssemblyDirectory to the directory containing the NativeAOT module #112457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Publish dotnet/runtime using standard Arcade Publish tooling #111934
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Optimize bit-wise and operation and compare with same constant value #111933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Consolidate layout passes into one phase #112004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112531
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.4
  • add follow-up assert during unwinding #112817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112530
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.15
  • [cDAC] Implement basic stackwalking #111759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • Allow using ldsflda on initonly fields outside of cctor #112081
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Add DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text/Clear #112171
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Support bitwise field extractions from parameter registers #112740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Min/Max paths with AVX10.2 intrinsics #112535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Contains for Distinct/Union with custom comparer #112815
    area-System.Linq
  • Move local thread pool work items to global by default when blocking on a task #112796
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable test #112780
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] add and load empty ES6 module dotnet.diag.js when FeaturePerfTracing #112787
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add Try methods to JsonObject #111229
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consolidate guid definitions #112826
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce memory footprint of HTTP/2 connections #112719
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Simplify conditional operator #112074
    area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Differentiate `MethodTable`s that are/aren't visible to reflection #112782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
